title: Gig Workers Are Being Stabbed, Stoned, and Abused in India
description: An Uber driver was mugged. An Ola driver was beaten and left in a coma. Platform workers say tech companies are doing little to protect them.

title: LinkedIn Verification Now Lets You Verify Your Job and Account
description: To beat back fake accounts, the professional social network is rolling out new tools to prove you work where you say you do and are who you say you are.

title: San Francisco Mayor London Breed on the City’s Troubles—and Hopes
description: We sat down with the leader of the storied city that WIRED calls home.

title: You May Get More EV Options Thanks to Tougher Emissions Rules
description: The US Environmental Protection Agency proposed new tailpipe standards that would require electric vehicles to make up two-thirds of new car sales by 2032.

title: A Small Town Became the Center of a QAnon Storm. It’s Fighting Back
description: The Netherlands’ most notorious conspiracy theorist was sentenced to prison, after spreading lies about satanic pedophiles in the town of Bodegraven.
